meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'nummy', meaning extremely tasty or delicious.
meanings.sent1: The cake was the nummiest dessert I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The chocolate chip cookies were the nummiest treat at the bake sale.
meanings.sent3: The nummiest cupcakes in town always sell out quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills are so good, she can make even the simplest dish taste nummiest.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen, making it the nummiest place in the house.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'nummy', meaning very cute or attractive.
meanings.sent1: The puppy with the big eyes was the nummiest little pet in the shelter.
meanings.sent2: The baby's chubby cheeks were the nummiest feature of her adorable face.
meanings.sent3: The nummiest teddy bear in the store had a bow tie and a top hat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so infectious, it made her the nummiest person in the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers in the garden created the nummiest view from the window.
